title: Frontend Developer
focus: Building user-facing interfaces with accessibility and performance in mind.
responsibilities: Implement responsive UI components and interactions.
Integrate frontend with backend APIs securely.
Collaborate with designers and product teams.

securityContributions.title: Secure UI Development
bullets: Prevent DOM-based XSS via input/output sanitization.
Avoid use of unsafe functions like eval.
Implement Content Security Policy (CSP).
Secure storage of sensitive data in browser.

title: Backend Developer
focus: Secure and scalable APIs and logic layer implementation.
responsibilities: Integrate with secure databases and services.

securityContributions.title: Secure API Practices
bullets: Validate all inputs server-side.
Limit error info exposed to clients.
Avoid injection flaws.
Enforce rate-limiting and access controls.

title: DevSecOps Engineer
focus: Secure CI/CD and infrastructure as code.

securityContributions.title: Security Automation
bullets: Embed SAST/DAST tools in CI/CD.
Scan containers for vulnerabilities.
Enforce policy-as-code (OPA, Checkov).
Audit access logs and build artifacts.

title: Mobile Developer
focus: Building secure native apps for iOS and Android.
responsibilities: Harden app against tampering and reverse engineering.

securityContributions.title: Secure Mobile Practices
bullets: Avoid hardcoded credentials or API keys.
Use certificate pinning where needed.
Follow OWASP MASVS guidance.
Obfuscate sensitive logic when possible.

title: QA Automation Engineer
focus: Write automated tests for functional and security regressions.
responsibilities: Use test data that mimics production securely.

securityContributions.title: Security Test Integration
bullets: Automate checks for XSS, injection, access control.
Use OWASP ZAP or similar in CI.
Assert on secure headers, tokens, and sessions.
Report security test failures as blockers.

title: Security Engineer
focus: Identify, assess, and mitigate risks across the lifecycle.
responsibilities: Perform threat modeling and code audits.
Run penetration tests and vulnerability scans.
Train teams on secure development practices.

securityContributions.title: Security Strategy & Review
bullets: Define SDL security gates and controls.
Maintain secure development playbooks.
Guide on secure third-party integrations.
Work with audit and compliance stakeholders.

title: Product Manager
focus: Own product vision, roadmap, and outcomes.

securityContributions.title: Secure Product Strategy
bullets: Treat security as a first-class product feature.
Understand data protection and compliance needs.
Fund and prioritize security in roadmaps.
Align secure defaults with user needs.

title: Product Owner
responsibilities: Work closely with engineering and QA.

securityContributions.title: Secure Sprint Planning
bullets: Prioritize remediation in sprint cycles.
Ensure user stories capture security needs.
Balance functional and security acceptance criteria.
Escalate risk-based decisions to PMs.

title: QA Analyst
focus: Define test strategy and ensure release quality.
responsibilities: Ensure feature acceptance and defect tracking.
Work across teams to cover scenarios.

securityContributions.title: Security-Aware Testing
bullets: Test edge cases involving permissions and inputs.
Include security cases in test plans.
Ensure session handling works as expected.
Flag risky UI flows or misconfigurations.

title: Business Analyst
focus: Bridge business needs to implementation strategy.
responsibilities: Work with stakeholders to prioritize needs.
Document current and future state models.
Support validation of features and workflows.

securityContributions.title: Secure Process Design
bullets: Document access control and data flows.
Ensure business rules support least privilege.
Capture compliance and data retention needs.
Identify risks early in process modeling.

title: Data Analyst
focus: Use data to generate product and business insights.
responsibilities: Design and run queries or reports.
Find trends and outliers in metrics.
Support A/B testing and usage research.

securityContributions.title: Data Integrity & Compliance
bullets: Ensure anonymized data where applicable.
Highlight anomalies or potential fraud.
Use secure access to data sources.
Document data sources and retention periods.

title: Project Manager
focus: Manage scope, risk, and resources for successful delivery.

securityContributions.title: Security Governance in Delivery
bullets: Ensure security is part of budget and scope.
Schedule security assessments as milestones.
Include security gates in release plans.
Raise security risks during trade-off discussions.
